Text: FW EWS MidYear PRC Meeting Cc your calendars for the July PRC meeting to prereview Vice Presidents in the following organizations Enron Americas Enron Global Markets Enron Industrial Markets Enron Networks Enron Global Assets Enron Engineering and Operational Services The meeting will be held at the St Regis Hotel Briar Oaks Lane Houston in the Colonnade Room from ampm In addition to the VP prereview the meeting will include a review of the distribution by company of the PRC results below Vice President Further details on the specific agenda will follow In the meantime please call me at X should you have any questions Sheila Knudsen

RE Reply Requested Do You Code Or Approve InvoicesMessage From Enron NRON mailtoIMCEANOTESEnronAnnouncementsCorpEnron NRONcom On Behalf Of NRON Sent Wednesday April AM To All Enron Employees United NRON Subject Reply Requested Do You Code Or Approve Invoices Do you code or approve invoices for goods and services that are processed by the Houstonbased Accounts Payable center If yes please read and respond to this email OLE Object Picture Metafile On May st iBuyit Payables will be activated for all organizations supported by the Houstonbased Accounts Payable processing center for example invoices submitted via AP drop box to Jefferson Houston If you code or approve these invoices the iBuyit Payables project team has important information to share with you about the iBuyit Payables system training and the May st transition to the new system To identify yourself as a future iBuyit Payables Coder or Approver please respond to this email upon receipt with the following information Full Name First Middle Last Sheila Knudsen Sheila Ann Knudsen Email address Sheila Knudsen Business unit For example Corporate ETS EWS EES or EBS Sheila Knudsen EWS Do you code invoices YesNo Sheila Knudsen Yes Do you approve invoices YesNo Sheila Knudsen Yes Are you a remote user For example do you dialup to access the Enron network YesNo Sheila Knudsen No This will ensure that you receive important iBuyit Payables information Thank you for your response Attached is important iBuyit Payables training information File iBuyit Payables Training Informationdoc

December PRC Meeting Cc your calendars for the December PRC meeting to prereview Vice Presidents in the following organizations Enron North America Enron Industrial Markets Enron Global Markets Enron Networks Enron South America APACHI CALME The meeting will be held at the St Regis Hotel Briar Oaks Lane Houston in the Plaza Room The meeting is scheduled from am to pm For those of you who are part of the Enron Wholesale Services Group please plan to be there at am as the first part of the meeting will be devoted to discussing PRC results of groups below Vice President and Manager to DirectorSr Director promotion nominations The Vice President rating is scheduled to begin at approximately am The telephone number of the hotel is A complete agenda and details will be forthcoming later this week For those of you in the organization units listed above please be prepared to present and discuss your Vice Presidents Please feel free to contact me at X in Houston should you have any questions Sheila Knudsen

EWS MidYear PRC Meeting Cc The EWS Final PRC meeting will be held on July at the St Regis Hotel Colonnade Room from am until pm Following the PRC meeting we will have a social hour in the room adjacent to the Colonnade Room from pm The purpose of the meeting is to review each of the following EWS business units distribution curves review promotion nominations to Director and Sr Director and finalize the preranking of Vice Presidents in preparation for the final Enronwide PRC meeting on July Representatives from the Enronwide PRC Committee will attend this part of the meeting as observers The business units included in the meeting are Enron Americas Enron Global Markets Enron Industrial Markets Enron Networks Enron Global Assets and Services Enron Engineering and Operational Services Attached is a complete agenda for the meeting Should you have any questions please dont hesitate to contact me at X Sheila

EWS Midyear PRC Meetingpst We have scheduled the EWS midyear PRC meeting to prerate VPs and to review the distribution of all groups below VP on July date is on your calendar Members of the committee will include Office of the Chairman from each EWS business unit and MDs For EA in addition to the two of you we are proposing the following MDs attend Phillip Allen Tim Belden Chris Calger Joe Deffner Tim Detmering Dave Duran Joe Kishkell Rob Milnthorp Brian Redmond Please confirm your agreement with the above list or let me know of any changes I will then send out a notice to all Let me know if you have any questions Thanks Sheila X

EWS MidYear PRC Meeting Cc EWS Final PRC meeting will be held on July at the St Regis Hotel Colonnade Room from am until pm Following the PRC meeting we will have a social hour in the room adjacent to the Colonnade Room from pm The purpose of the meeting is to review each of the following EWS business units distribution curves review promotion nominations to Director and Sr Director and finalize the preranking of Vice Presidents in preparation for the final Enronwide PRC meeting on July Representatives from the Enronwide PRC Committee will attend this part of the meeting as observers The business units included in the meeting are Enron Americas Enron Global Markets Enron Industrial Markets Enron Networks Enron Global Assets and Services Enron Engineering and Operational Services Attached is a complete agenda for the meeting Should you have any questions please dont hesitate to contact me at X Sheila
